    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    CommandPanel
    A custom panel containing all the choices for the player
    Damage
    For the moves that deal damage
    DoNormalDamage
    For the normal attacks
    DoSpecialDamage
    For the special attacks
    EnemyPokemon
    The pokemon used by the enemy
    EnStat
    For moves that change the enemy stats
    Entry
    A row used in the leaderboard
    FileRw
    Contain various functions to read info from text files
    Game
    A custom panel containing the game itself
    GameOver
    A custom window for the game over
    JPokeBattle
    The entry point of the program
    Leaderboard
    A custom window that display the records of the game, uses a singleton pattern to avoid multiple open windows
    MainMenu
    A custom window that serves as the main window of the game
    Move
    A move performed by a pokemon
    MoveButton
    A custom button that is associated with a pokemon move
    MoveChange
    A custom JDialog that let the player choose to swap a move or not when the pokemon has 4 moves and wants to learn a new one
    MoveFunction
    The function executed by a move
    MoveType
    The moves can be categorized in one these five categories
    PlayerPokemon
    The pokemon used by the player
    Pokemon
    A pokemon
    RecordTable
    A custom table used to store records from the game
    SelfStat
    For moves that change the stats of the user itself
    SoundPlayer
    An audio player used for the pokemon's cry
    SpriteFinder
    Find the sprites of the pokemon
    Stat
    The stats that can be changed
    Stats
    The stats of a pokemon
    StatsChange
    For the moves that change stats
    Type
    All the pokemon and move types in the first gen
    VisualBattle
    A custom panel containing the visual part of the game
